title: 3.1 Master Challenge 2
question:
Search for a term using the search bar of the search engine you opened in challenge 1. Click on a link that is shown as a result.
What is the term you searched for? _________________________
What is the link to the web page you visited? _________________________
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
